faqs.question: What is the baggage allowance for Economy class?
faqs.answer: Economy passengers may check two bags (23 kg each) plus one 7 kg cabin bag.

faqs.question: How long do I have to request a full refund after booking?
faqs.answer: You may claim a full refund within 24 hours of purchase provided the departure date is more than 7 days away.

faqs.question: When does online check-in open?
faqs.answer: Online check-in opens 48 hours before departure for all cabins.
